      • setUp

           throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes _gs and _c.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is an error in initialization.

      • outOfRange

        public void outOfRange()
        Tests a State with one Monster and one Character that are out of range.

      • oneInRange

        public void oneInRange()
        Tests a situation with one player in range and one player out of range for correctness of VM.inRange()

      • testDistances

        public void testDistances()
        Tests correct calculation of distances. Executes all monsters strategies, regardless of player range. After each execution, the VM.clearData() is NOT called.. After all executions, VM.getDistances() is called and checked.

      • testNearAndFar

        public void testNearAndFar()
        Tests the setNearAndFar method as well as the setRandom method in VM Stores the name of nearest, farthest, random player each time a monster executes a strategy in a ArrayList, and afterwards, compares it with another ArrayList.
